channel.title: AlacritousX | 317 Loading 474 | 24/7 VPS
channel.description:
[center][img]http://alacritous.x10.mx/smf/Themes/BlackRainV3_20g_/images/logo.png[/img]
Server Website: [url=http://alacritousx.com/]http://alacritousx.com/[/url]
[size=12pt]A server that doesn't improve isn't a server worth playing, I aim is to host an RSPS with a combination of things we like from old RuneScape and new RuneScape. Old character models with 474 and 508+ maps, and items up to revision 614 such as the christmas ghost costume, all while limiting how much we add to keep the game simple like the old RuneScape we loved. I will do my best to maintain a friendly and non-abusive staff and community. Staff members are picked from people I know in real life, and people I trust. It is never sold for profit. I'm not hosting the server for profit, which is why I don't and will never accept RSGP, RS accounts, or RS membership. Donations should be used strictly for the server's upkeep and development. I will continue to add new content to both the server and client to keep the game from going stale because every server has room for improvement.[/size]
[size=18pt]Features[/size]
[size=14pt][color=green]317 Loading 474 474 Game Data 474+ Items 474+ Maps 474 NPCs 24/7 VPS
Clean and Organized Home Rare Drop Tables Working Ring of Wealth Working Barrow Effects
Godwars with Killcount TzTok-Jad Dagannoth Kings Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon
Rock Crabs Brimhaven Dungeon Taverlly Dungeon Dragons' Dungeon Slayer Tower
Duel Arena Pest Control Barrows Blessed City PvP
[size=18pt]Media[/size]
[URL=http://s1074.photobucket.com/user/crabbyscape474/media/rrr_zps384440c5.png.html][IMG]http://i1074.photobucket.com/albums/w406/crabbyscape474/rrr_zps384440c5.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s1074.photobucket.com/user/crabbyscape474/media/rr2_zps39ba20a7.png.html][IMG]http://i1074.photobucket.com/albums/w406/crabbyscape474/rr2_zps39ba20a7.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: AlacritousX | 317 Loading 474 | 24/7 VPS
item.dc:creator: @krazymofo krazymofo
item.description:
@krazymofo wrote:

DukeDice:

can u make a jar i don’t understand folder ones

Just download winrar, it’s a very easy process. but besides that this server has some great plans. Been playing with the owner and head developer and they have some wonderful things in stored for everyone. The mixture of both worlds and everyone is friendly… I Give It a Huge Thumbs Up! -kush-

Read full topic
